Item ID1605

An emerald is a green gem used in Crafting and Fletching. Emeralds can be cut from uncut emeralds with level 27 Crafting by using a chisel, granting 67.5 experience. When used with a furnace and jewellery mould, they can be used to make emerald jewellery.

One emerald is needed in the A Taste of Hope quest in order to turn a silver sickle (b) into an emerald sickle (b).

Training[edit | edit source]

Crafting[edit | edit source]

Emeralds can be crafted into jewellery at a furnace by using a gold bar and the appropriate crafting mould.

Level Input Material Cost[1] Output Sell Price Profit / loss XP/Craft XP/Hour Coins/XP
27 Uncut emerald 562 Emerald 465 −97 67.5 195,750 −1.44
27 Emerald Gold bar 552 Emerald ring 687 135 55 35,750 2.45
29 Emerald Gold bar 552 Emerald necklace 697 145 60 39,000 2.42
30 Emerald Gold bar 552 Emerald bracelet 778 226 65 42,250 3.48
31 Emerald Gold bar 552 Emerald amulet (u) 662 110 70 45,500 2.93
31 Emerald amulet (u) Ball of wool 698 Emerald amulet 757 59 4 8,000 14.75
1 Emerald amulet (u) Magic string 1,417 Pre-nature amulet Not Sold −1,417 4 8,000 −354.25
  1. ↑ Cost calculated assuming all inputs are purchased from the Grand exchange.

Magic[edit | edit source]

Emerald jewellery can be enchanted using Lvl-2 Enchant, requiring level 27 Magic. The spell requires 1 Cosmic rune, 3 Air rune and the piece of Emerald Jewellery that is to be enchanted.

Unenchanted Unenchanted price Material Cost[1] Enchanted Enchanted price Profit/Loss XP/Cast XP/Hour Coins/XP
Emerald ring 687 781 Ring of dueling(8) 807 26 37 59,200 0.7
Emerald necklace 697 791 Binding necklace 916 125 37 59,200 3.38
Emerald bracelet 778 872 Castle wars bracelet 885 13 37 59,200 0.35
Emerald amulet 757 851 Amulet of defence 852 1 37 59,200 0.03
Pre-nature amulet Not Sold 94 Amulet of nature Not Sold −94 37 59,200 −2.54
  1. ↑ Cost calculated using a Staff of air (provides unlimited air runes) and includes costs of Cosmic runes.

Combined[edit | edit source]

Requires 27 Magic; for XP rates and Crafting requirements, see above tables. Assumes a Staff of Air is wielded for enchantment.

Materials Material cost Product Product value Profit
Emerald Gold bar Cosmic rune 646 Ring of dueling(8) 807 161
Emerald Gold bar Cosmic rune 646 Binding necklace 916 270
Emerald Gold bar Cosmic rune 646 Castle wars bracelet 885 239
Emerald Gold bar Cosmic rune Ball of wool 682 Amulet of defence 852 170
Emerald Gold bar Cosmic rune Magic string 1,401 Amulet of nature Not Sold −1,401

Other[edit | edit source]

Cut emeralds can also be used to make the following items:

  • Emerald bolt tips, which requires level 58 Fletching and yields 5.5 experience per gem

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
Date unknown

Gems available on free-to-play worlds can no longer be crushed with a hammer to receive a members object (crushed gem).
